title: Uninstall
content:
This topic provides instructions to uninstall OMT and the suite in your deployment.

For instructions to uninstall OMT, see the following topics. Refer to the topic relevant to your deployment:

  • Uninstall OMT on embedded Kubernetes.
  • Uninstall OMT on managed Kubernetes.

For instructions to uninstall the suite, see the following topics. Refer to the topic relevant to your deployment.

  • Uninstall the suite on embedded Kubernetes
  • Uninstall the suite on AWS
  • Uninstall the suite on Azure
  • Uninstall the suite on GCP
  • Uninstall the suite on OpenShift
